content: crochet drops poncho with hood fan pattern worked top down in andes drops extra 0-1166 drops design pattern no an-034 yarn group e or c + c size s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl materials drops andes from garnstudio 700-800-800-900-1000-1100 g color no 6343 twilight blue drops crochet hook size 7 mm/k or l or size needed to get 10 double_crochet x 6 row = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm a 2 measures approx 9 cm / 3½ in width drops dark buffelhorn buttons no 536 3 pieces in all sizes work back and forth from neck and down then work the hood uk version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=7251&cid=19
